src:
【直播預告】川普將參加密西西比助選集會（中文同聲翻譯）

01 Nov 2019, 00:10

【新唐人北京時間2019年10月31日訊】美國總統川普將於週五（11月1日）參加密西西比州的圖珀洛（Tupelo）集會，為共和黨州長提名的泰特‧里夫斯（Tate Reeves）助選。新唐人電視台和《大紀元時報》將進行全程追蹤和網絡直播，並有同聲翻譯。請鎖定新聞直播間。



圖珀洛市週三（30日）宣布，川普總統將於週五下午7點在BancorpSouth體育館舉行「保持美國偉大」的集會。市長傑森‧謝爾頓（Jason Shelton）敦促人們做出相應安排，參加川普總統的競選集會。
這次集會是在11月5日選舉前幾天舉行。共和黨州長候選人泰特‧里夫斯預計參加集會。
這次選舉將是一場激烈的競爭。梅森‧迪克森（Mason Dixon）的最新民意測驗顯示，共和黨人泰特‧里夫斯比民主黨人吉姆·胡德（Jim Hood）略占優勢。然而，胡德的內部民意測驗顯示，胡德領先里夫斯。
川普總統曾於2018年11月首次訪問圖珀洛，並為共和黨參議員候選人辛迪‧海德‧史密斯（Cindy Hyde-Smith）的競選造勢。她後來贏得了11月的特別選舉。
大紀元和新唐人網絡直播時間：美東時間：11月1日（週五）下午19:00開始（中港台時間：11月2日凌晨7:00開始）
網絡收看方式：新唐人網站：https://www.ntdtv.com大紀元網站：https://www.epochtimes.com/b5/nf1334917.htm新唐人臉書直播：facebook.com/NTDCHINESE新唐人YouTube直播：youtube.com/user/NTDCHINESE大紀元臉書直播：facebook.com/djy.news大紀元時報-台灣臉書直播：facebook.com/epochtimes.taiwan大紀元新聞頻道：https://www.youtube.com/c/djynews

text:
[Live preview] Trump will participate in Mississippi assisted selection (Chinese simultaneous translation)

01 Nov 2019, 00:10

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing, October 31, 2019] US President Trump will attend the Tupelo rally in Mississippi on Friday (November 1), Tate Reeves nominated for Republican Governor (Tate Reeves) assists. NTDTV and the Epoch Times will conduct a full-time tracking and webcast, and have simultaneous translations. Please lock the news live room.



Tupelo City announced on Wednesday that President Trump will hold a "keep America's great" rally at Bancorp South Stadium at 7 pm on Friday. Mayor Jason Shelton urged people to make arrangements to participate in the campaign rally of President Trump.
The rally was held a few days before the November 5 election. Republican governor candidate Tate Reeves is expected to attend the rally.
This election will be a fierce competition. Mason Dixon's latest poll showed that Republican Tate Reeves had a slight advantage over Democrat Jim Hood. However, Hood’s internal poll showed that Hood was ahead of Reeves.
President Trump visited Tupelo for the first time in November 2018 and campaigned for Republican Senate candidate Cindy Hyde-Smith. She later won the special election in November.
Epoch Times and NTDTV Live Time: US East Time: November 1st (Friday) at 19:00 pm (China Hong Kong and Taiwan Time: 7:00 am on November 2)
Online viewing: NTD website: https://www.ntdtv.com Epoch Times website: https://www.epochtimes.com/b5/nf1334917.htm New Tang Dynasty Facebook Live: facebook.com/NTDCHINESE NTDTV Live: youtube .com/user/NTDCHINESE Epoch Times Facebook: facebook.com/djy.news Epoch Times - Taiwan Facebook Live: facebook.com/epochtimes.taiwan Epoch Times News Channel: https://www.youtube.com/ c/djynews
